sent.orig: In the word "employ" the emphasis is on the second syllable.
sent.trans: "employ"这个字中，重音在第二个音节上。

sent.orig: I employ to abuse the unusual usage, but now I'm not employ to doing so.
sent.trans: 我过去常滥用那个不寻常的应用，但我目前不习惯那样做。

sent.orig: If our company and another has employ you together, how would you choose?
sent.trans: 如果我们公司和另外一个公司同时聘用你，你将如何选择？

sent.orig: A hot &cold mixer is employ to do the runing runing temperature comfortable.
sent.trans: 冷热水调节器是用于使水温适宜。

sent.trans: 小偷确定是用万能钥匙打开保险柜的。
